sentences.en: "Cut it out, Chip," I said.
sentences.cn: “打住吧，奇普，”我说道。

sentences.en: [with direct speech]‘He's right,’ Gloria chipped in.
sentences.cn: “他是对的，”格洛丽亚插话道。

sentences.en: a bag of chips
sentences.cn: 一袋炸薯条

sentences.en: a chocolate chip cookie (= one that contains small pieces of chocolate )
sentences.cn: 碎粒巧克力饼干

sentences.en: All the plates have chip ped edges.
sentences.cn: 所有盘子边上都有破损.

sentences.en: Archaeologists were carefully chipping away at the rock.
sentences.cn: 考古学家正小心地在岩石上铲凿。

sentences.en: Chip and PIN is designed to combat credit card fraud.
sentences.cn: 智能卡系统是专为防止信用卡诈骗设计的。

sentences.en: Chip out the plaster with a steel chisel.
sentences.cn: 用钢凿子铲掉那些灰泥。

sentences.en: chip technology
sentences.cn: 芯片技术

sentences.en: He used a hammer and chisel to chip away at the wall.
sentences.cn: 他用榔头和凿子铲墙。

sentences.en: I've just made some chocolate - chip cookies.
sentences.cn: 我刚做了些巧克力甜饼.

sentences.en: rivals may &B{chip away at} one's profits by undercutting product prices.
sentences.cn: 竞争对手会以更低的产品价格来减少对方的利润。

sentences.en: Rollie &B{chipped in with} nine saves and five wins.
sentences.cn: 罗利贡献了9次救球，5次得分。

sentences.en: That was Nicholas's cue to ask for another chocolate chip cookie.
sentences.cn: 那表示尼古拉斯还想要一块巧克力曲奇。

sentences.en: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.cn: 芯片时代

sentences.en: the council will chip in a further £30,000 a year.
sentences.cn: 市政会将每年追加投入30,000英镑。

sentences.en: The old man would chip in while we were speaking.
sentences.cn: 我们在谈话时,那老头儿总要插嘴.

sentences.en: The vacuum flask has a strong casing, which won't crack or chip.
sentences.cn: 这种热水瓶瓶身坚固，不易断裂破碎。

sentences.en: The washbasin had a small chip.
sentences.cn: 脸盆边上有个小豁口。

sentences.en: There's a chip in this cup.
sentences.cn: 这杯子上有个缺口.

sentences.en: These cups chip easily.
sentences.cn: 这些杯子容易碎裂.

sentences.en: They chip in for the petrol and food.
sentences.cn: 他们凑钱买汽油和食物。

sentences.en: This company pioneered the use of silicon chip.
sentences.cn: 这家公司开创了使用硅片的方法.

sentences.en: This mug has a chip in it.
sentences.cn: 这缸子有个豁口。

sentences.en: Tomorrow's children will be even more in the thrall of the silicon chip.
sentences.cn: 将来硅片对孩子们的影响将进一步加深。

sentences.en: We all chipped in for champagne.
sentences.cn: 我们一齐凑钱买了香槟

sentences.en: Wood chips covered the floor of the workshop.
sentences.cn: 工场的地板上满是木屑。

words.tran_cn: 削片机；凿子；削东西的人；唧唧喳喳

phrases.phrase: a chip off the old block
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（尤指性格）和父亲或母亲相似的人
(非正式)（尤指对某事）根深蒂固的不满
谈判的筹码；讨价还价的筹码
蓝筹股；优值股票；高值筹码
削弱；损害；一点点地除掉；从…抽去实质性的东西
木屑压碎机；石片压碎机
&I{【游戏】} 下赌注：在扑克和其它游戏中用筹码或钱下赌注
(英，非正式)加入谈话（尤指插话）
酷似双亲：外表或性格酷似父母中一个的孩子
习惯性敌对或好斗的态度
油炸食品店（卖炸鱼或炸土豆条）

trans.tran_cn: 炸薯条，炸薯片，芯片，碎片，缺口，筹码
trans.tran_en: a small piece of wood, stone, metal etc that has been broken off something
to remove something, especially something hard that is covering a surface, by hitting it with a tool so that small pieces break off
